name: Justin E. FOCHT, Respondent v. Tracy L. FOCHT, Petitioner

parties: Justin E. FOCHT, Respondent v. Tracy L. FOCHT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of August, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased and consolidated for clarity, is:
When does a cause of action or claim accrue for purposes of determining whether it is marital property pursuant to 23 Pa.C.S. § 3501(a)(8)?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
1 A.3d 867
Justin E. FOCHT, Respondent v. Tracy L. FOCHT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 11, 2010.
